title: The Truth Lies
description: The 'The Truth Lies' teaser site for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 features a 90s-style TV and a mysterious campaign where activists cover historical monuments with blindfolds, emphasizing the phrase. It builds intrigue for the game's Gulf War-era setting..
briefDescription: The Truth Lies is a marketing campaign and an immersive interactive experience developed for the Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War universe. The website combines an engaging narrative with realistic graphics, providing visitors with a mysterious and tense atmosphere. Through clues and videos, the site takes players on a journey to uncover hidden secrets related to the game's storyline. The experience includes 3D elements, puzzles, and a careful build-up of suspense, reflecting the dark and conspiratorial tone of the Call of Duty universe.
